subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The agreement to sign Davis, who accepted a seven-year, $161 million deal, may mean Cespedes, another free agent Baltimore courted, would take a short-term contract with New York.
snippet: The agreement to sign Davis, who accepted a seven-year, $161 million deal, may mean Cespedes, another free agent Baltimore courted, would take a short-term contract with New York.
